concept.title: Proxy server configuration files
concept.shortdesc: There are a number of configuration files on the Sametime Proxy server that a backup copy should be retained after the server configuration is complete.

row.entry: Contain configuration parameters that were set at the time of the Sametime Proxy installation

Contains configuration details for multiple options including the following:
Community server configuration
Business card configuration
Mobile client configuration
SAML configuration
XML syntax rules apply
Contains the MongoDB configuration details such as username and password
Contains properties to secure the Sametime Proxy server. Note that syntax rules must be followed.
